## ExtensionTagParams interface

An interface with a `tags` parameter useful as a builder for parameter objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtensionTagParams<GNodes extends string = string, GMarks extends string = string, GPlain extends string = string> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [tags](./core-types.extensiontagparams.tags.md) | <code>ExtensionTags&lt;GNodes, GMarks, GPlain&gt;</code> | The tags provided by the configured extensions. |
